title: Croatia’s Vujcic Closes in on ECB No. 2 Job in Tussle With Rehn
description: Croatia’s Boris Vujcic is heading for victory in the race for the European Central Bank vice presidency with only Finland’s Olli Rehn left to beat after two rounds of voting by finance ministers, according to people with knowledge of the matter.
content: Croatia’s Boris Vujcic is heading for victory in the race for the European Central Bank vice presidency with only Finland’s Olli Rehn left to beat after two rounds of voting by finance ministers, according to people with knowledge of the matter.
